name: Space Glitcher 2
description:
You play as Number One, an intergalactic thief, and with the help of your crew you have stolen the last remaining extra-dimentional crystal. But look out, at the last second you got caught! A huge bounty has been placed on your head and it's only going to get bigger.

Fortunately, you have a trick up your sleeve. The crystal you stole, when connected to your ship, will allow you to go "extra-dimentional". For a brief moment all objects will pass through you, potentially saving your life.

Fight your way through waves of Federal Police, bounty hunters and signal-jamming motherships in this action-packed space shooter!

Controls Left Mouse ButtonThrust/AccelerateRight Mouse Button
Fire Weapons
Middle Mouse Button
Go "extra-dimentional"

I ran in to issues with the Player Settings, so the resolution is too small and I ran out of time to fix it. If you have issues, please try the windows executable.

Attributions
